::Grimmler/Rex::

Grimmler and Rex nearly crash into each other, running up to the door of the 
room that BrightBlade was in from opposite directions. They both turn to the 
door, guns ready, waiting for instruction from Chordate.

"Chordate," Rex says into his comm-link, "Rex here. Me and Grimmler are at 
the intruder's room, awaiting orders."
